name: Good Molecules Overnight Exfoliating Treatment - Face Exfoliator with AHA & BHA Lightweight Formula - Pore Minimizer, Facial Skin Care with Glycolic & Salicylic Acid
short_description: BRIGHTEN, EXFOLIATE, AND RESURFACE: Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Overnight Exfoliating treatment made with powerful ingredients to reveal your most radiant skin. Renew and resurface while you rest, wake up glowing!

FIGHT BREAKOUTS AND IMPROVE TEXTURE: Notice the difference in your skin! This gentle yet exfoliating treatment targets texture, congestion, clogged pores, enlarged pores, and dullness with a formula designed to bring out the best in your skin.

POTENT FORMULA FOR RADIANT SKIN: Glycolic and lactic acid (AHAs) go to work on the surface of your skin to promote renewal and improved texture, while Salicylic Acid (BHA) works to combat breakouts, blemishes, and irritations.

PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Apply a few drops to clean skin at night up to three times per week. Let sit for several minutes before continuing with your routine. We recommend wearing SPF during the day when using this product.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for regular use; this serum is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 3.5, is fragrance-free, vegan, and was never tested on animals.

name: goPure Refine It 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant – Pore refining, texture smoothing, complexion correcting, infused with nourishing fruit extracts, safe for all skin types
short_description: REFINED RESULTS: Salicylic Acid is an oil-soluble exfoliant that is excellent at seeping deep into the pores and exfoliating from the inside out. This formula is designed to clear out dead skin cells and excess oil deep within pores to visibly refine the look of bumpy, scarred, blemish-prone skin.

CORRECT & BRIGHTEN: For an added dose of perfection, a bioactive Tropical Fruit Complex enhances the benefits of the 2% BHA. This blend accelerates the exfoliation process for a boost in results, like visibly soothing redness and fading the look of hyperpigmentation.

SOOTHING SKINCARE: This formula softly wraps skin in nourishing, hydrating, soothing ingredients. Gentle enough to use multiple times a week, this formula is a powerhouse for refining and perfecting the look of skin without causing damage.
SAFE FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Gentle yet highly effective, this refining exfoliant is safe for anyone wanting to clear out congested pores.

GOPURE BEAUTY: Backed by science and cruelty-free practices, our clean and kind lineup was formulated to be safe and ultra effective. Enjoy a daily ritual that delivers natural botanicals, potent active ingredients, real results, and a luxury experience at prices that just make sense.

short_description: RaoNEE is a heartfelt brand created by a father dedicated to providing safe and effective skincare for his daughter, RaoNEE. Made in Korea. k-beauty. How to read expiration dates (written in Korean) ****/**/** year/month/day: Read in order.

RaoNEE TRIPLE TONER: Experience gentle, but effective 3 main benefits- exfoliating, soothing and calming, and moisturizing. This facial toner efficiently dissolves dead skin cells, clears pores, balances skin pH, and provides hydration throughout the day. An excellent preparatory step for the rest of your skincare routine.

Mild Exfoliation: Experience gentle exfoliation with our specially formulated toner that includes AHA, BHA, PHA, and LHA. AHA helps in dissolving dead skin cells, while BHA focuses on clearing sebum to improve the appearance of acne and blackheads with minimal irritation. PHA combines the benefits of AHA and BHA, and LHA maintains a skin-friendly pH of 5.5, making it appropriate for various skin types, including sensitive skin. Achieve a refreshed and smoother complexion with RaoNEE Triple Toner.

SOOTHING AND CALMING FORMULA: Heartleaf, Centella Asiatica (also known as Cica), Panthenol and other calming ingredients will deliver relief from irritation, redness and stress on skin. Especially, Heartleaf and Centella Asiatica are natural ingredients known for their soothing and calming properties.

DEEP MOISTURIZING: Portulaca Oleracia Extract and Hyaluronic Acid alleviate dryness and keep your skin deeply hydrated all day long. Packed with a complex of 8 different hyaluronic acids, this gel-fluid but non-sticky texture toner replenishes moisture and strengthens your skin's moisture barrier. Fully moisturized skin will give you glow, dewy and healthier look on your face.
